title: How much money do I have?

Here is every coin I have.
How much money do I have?

data.constraints: Coins can only be {{quarter}} or {{dime}} or {{nickel}} or {{penny}}
data.stubGenerator:
read stringOfCoins:string(10000)
write how much money all that is

STATEMENT
quarter = $0.25
dime = $0.10
nickel = $0.05
penny = $0.01
data.inputDescription: A string, the name of each coin I have, divided by a space
data.outputDescription: The total value of the coins, in appropriate dollar-format.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Here is every coin I have.
How much money do I have?

(If needed, value of coins are in the Stub.)
Input
A string, the name of each coin I have, divided by a space
Output
The total value of the coins, in appropriate dollar-format.
Constraints
Coins can only be quarter or dime or nickel or penny
Example
Input
dime nickel quarter nickel penny
Output
$0.46
